'''Northern Smoked Chicken''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Northern Smoked Chicken is obtainable inside a Chest near the top of the central tower at [[Stormterror's Lair]]. Northern Smoked Chicken can also be purchased from [[Brook]] for 1,850 [[Mora]] (max 2 per day).

Depending on the quality, Northern Smoked Chicken restores '''40'''/'''50'''/'''60''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
